Package edu.odu.cs.cs350.acmClassifier

Class learningMachine

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.odu.cs.cs350.acmClassifier.learningMachine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    public class learningMachine
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Applies document signatures to machine learning, affecting training data used by the librarian class.
    See Also:

      • getTraining

        public HashMap<Queue<Integer>,​SortedSet<Character>> getTraining()
        Gets the associated saved training data for this learning machine
        Returns:
        A hash map of a queue of integers representing the raw signature and a set of character labels corresponding to each signature

      • write

        public void write()
           throws IOException
        Writes the associated documentSignature to the output training data file. If there is existing data in the file, append to it.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • deleteTraining

        public final boolean deleteTraining()
                             throws SecurityException
        Deletes the associated training file if it exists
        Returns:
        true iff the file was deleted
        Throws:
        SecurityException

      • readTraining

        public void readTraining()
                  throws IOException
        Reads the associated output training file (located at outputFileLocation) and puts the contents into the private member savedTraining. savedTraining contains a map of: - (Key) The signature contained in the file in the form of numbers separated by spaces. - (Value) The read label(s) at the end of the signature in the form of a sorted set of characters, each a label associated with the signature.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • train

        public void train​(String fileLocation,
                  String labels)
        Train the learning machine Should be called by the train script at the command line
        Parameters:
        fileLocation - : A string denoting the target file location
        labels - : A string denoting labels associated with the target file

      • train

        public void train​(String labels)
        Train the learning machine Uses an already associated text document, setting its labels
        Parameters:
        labels - : A string denoting labels associated with the already associated file

        public boolean equals​(Object obj)
